lines:
Dr S. S. Ran

Jan. 4. 1910

95h

79 Montgomery

Footer Mase

yer K

I so sending you $20.00 96 requested, and $5.00 t» over the 1111 for shoes, 
Kindly return the enclosed beetpt, and recent for the shoe 011) also when it has been 
paid, and greatly oblige. 
Wishing you the, happiest of new years, believe me

Very sincerely yours,

Principais

Wishing you the, happiest of new years, believe me  Very sincerely yours,  Principais

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter enclosing $10 plus $5 to cover shoes purchased and requesting a receipt for same.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
